Recently bought this lot on the BST for a few cards and am looking to sell the rest as singles or a lot, first come first served via PM. Prices are below:

Lennox $15
Pelty Sovereign Green Apple $30
Abbott Sovereign $20
Dubuc $15
Pelty SC350 trimmed $20
Magee PB $15
Fiene PB $15

Or take the whole lot for $120 shipped. Otherwise, please add $3 for shipping. SOLD

Thanks,
Lee
